subject: Policy for sanction and payment of electrical utility shifting estimates.
text: HRaly 7cly  TTHrf %fetdh7u T4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (wed 9av7t a1r <Hrf `T4) YAA Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 91 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 Q 6, 84zr-10, ERWT, T{ fcz)-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 24th January 2014 No.11041/218/2007-Admn n~ POLICY MATTER Technical (148/2014) [Decision_taken_in 176" meeting of_Executive Committeeheld.0n 30.12.2013 vide Agenda Item No1] Sub: Policy for sanction and payment of electrical utility shifting estimates. The delegation of powers and procedure to be followed in matters relating to Utility Shifting work have been circulated vide following policy circulars: Policy Matters Technical (127/2013) dated 07.03.2013 (j) Policy Matters Technical (114/2012) dated 05.10.2012 (iii) Policy Matters Technical (109/2012) dated 18.07.2012 iv) Policy Matters Technical (108/2012) dated 09.07.2012 Policy Matters Technical (34/2009) dated 27.07.2009 (vi) Policy Matters Admn/Fin (28/2008) dated 19.02.2008 (vii) Policy Matters Admn/Fin (07/2007) dated 29.01.2007 (viii) Policy Matters Technical (62/2006) dated 10.01.2006 (ix) Policy Matters Admn/Fin (87/2004) dated 12.07.2004 2 Further, the policy relating to sanction and payment of electrical utility  shifting estimates was deliberated in the 176th Meeting of Executive Committee held on 30.12.2013 and the following have been decided: A) Policy for sanction and payment of electrical utility shifting estimates if the work is to be done by utility owning department: SI: Provisions in the estimate Payment to be made No. Cost of electrical shifting work as per Payment to the utility owning department as current SOR (including provision of certified by PD and  getting the   utilization procurement of material, carriage to certificate. site, storage and installation complete) & quantities certified by PD 3% contingency (maximum) Contingency amount to be as per actuals as certified by PD. RI RT NHAI paid
